updateRevision

public boolean updateRevision(org.openrdf.model.URI resource,
                              WikiStorage.WikiRevision rev)
Description copied from class: WikiStorage
Updates a single wiki revision: the revision is identified by the resource and date, and the remaining content is replaced. If the revision does not exist, a RuntimeException is thrown.
